StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetOso369EvalTasks]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@TrainingFileID uniqueidentifier
AS
BEGIN
SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED
SELECT et.ID, et.Designa.on, et.Title, et.DateCer..ed, et.EvalSignatureID, U1.FirstName EvalFirstName, U1.MiddleName EvalMiddleName, U1.LastName EvalLastName, et.OSOSignatureID, U2.FirstName OSOFirstName, U2.MiddleName OSOMiddleName, U2.LastName OSOLastName FROM USMC.Evalua.onTask et JOIN USMC.Mul.MonthEvalua.on AS me ON me.ID = et.Mul.MonthEvalua.onId JOIN USMC.TrainingFile AS . ON ..ID = me.TrainingFileID LEFT OUTER JOIN USMC.vwMcrissUserMgmtUser AS U1 ON U1.UserID = et.EvalSignatureID LEFT OUTER JOIN USMC.vwMcrissUserMgmtUser AS U2 ON U2.UserID = et.OSOSignatureID WHERE ..ID=@TrainingFileID ORDER BY le.(et.Designa.on,1) desc, et.Designa.on, .tle
END
